Interface com.chimu.dome.state.StateToReplicateInterface

public interface StateToReplicateInterface
The StateToReplicateInterface is the interface expected of an object that is used with dome.states. It is divided between a single method to simply record the desired new state and multiple methods to cause an actual state change to effected on the object.

See Also:
ReplicateState, StatePack
